description.value:
[Slotless]

Effect You gain access to either the ranger feat @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Relentless Stalker]{Relentless Stalker} or the skill feat @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Wilderness Spotter]{Wilderness Spotter}. Once you have taken one of these feats, check the box next to this boon and cross the other one out.
